attributes.comment:
I am not in favor of the proposed increase in filing fees, especially those
associated with international adoption. Families adopting internationally are
already having to re-file the documents that are required because of the increased
wait time associated with international adoption. We are currently paying double
the intended fee because of this. If any changes should be considered to the
current process, especially those associated with adoption, it should be to
increase the time the filed documents are valid because 12 months is NOT long
enough and does not correspond with the current wait time on many international
adoptions.

Families adopting internationally are already spending a considerable amount of
money and raising the cost of the filing fees would only cause more frustration and
heartbreak. Please listen to our voices.

Sincerely,
Teresa West
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Teresa West
